name: Space Wave (Casevse)
description:
Space Wave was developed for the Global Game Jam 2017. The player has to dodge and destroy the obstacles along a Space Wave.

Controls:

  • Cursors -> Move
  • Space -> Shoot

Developed by:

  • Carlos Sevila (Casevse)
  • Jorge Gonzalez
  • Javier Saez

Enjoy the game!
